name: Trekking & Homestay with locals in Thong Nguyen velley, Hoang Su Phi
description: Terraced fields are a type of farming that is relatively common, presenting in many countries, especially the countries of Southeast Asia, such as Vietnam, Laos, Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia and a number of provinces in Southern China. In Vietnam, terracing system is the mode of production of many ethnic groups living in the northern mountains like La Chi, Ha Nhi, Mong, Dao, Nung and so on. Every ethnic group has their own processes of establishment and development on different terraces. Habits, ways of farming as well as the rituals and beliefs of agriculture are not the same. In Ha Giang province, farming methods on terraced fields are concentrated in the western mountainous districts of the province of which, the most typical rice terrace is of the peoples living in Hoang Su Phi district.
